All functions

IPBES.R-package IPBES.R
Tool functions used by the Data and Knowledge Technical Support Unit of IPBES
abbreviate_authors()
Abbreviate Authors
doi_exists()
Check if DOIs exist
doi_not_retracted()
Check if DOIs are not retracted
doi_valid()
Validate DOIs
get_count()
Get Count
map_country_codes()
Draw Map Map of Country Codes
oa_request_IPBES()
Get bibliographic records from OpenAlex database
plot_snowball()
Plot Snowball
plot_snowball_interactive()
Plot an Interactive Citation Network from a Snowball Search
table_dt()
Create a DataTable with various export options
to_xlsx()
Convert Snowball to XLSX

Developed by Rainer M. Krug.
